Below you will find a simple excercise on Random Forests with an easy challenge. Please download the script and the data.

**R data**

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(downloadthis)
download_link(
  link = "https://github.com/michelleg06/Machine-Learning-for-Public-Policy/blob/main/malawi_2005.RDS",
  button_label = "Download malawi_2005 data (RDS)",
  button_type = "info",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  self_contained = FALSE
)

```

**R script**

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(downloadthis)
download_link(
  link = "https://github.com/michelleg06/Machine-Learning-for-Public-Policy/blob/main/RandomForests.R",
  button_label = "Download RandomForests.R script",
  button_type = "info",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  self_contained = FALSE
)

```
